meanings.sent1: The ultrarefined sugar crystals sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: She wore an ultrarefined dress made of the finest silk.
meanings.sent3: The ultrarefined gentleman only drank tea with his pinky finger up.
meanings.sent4: Her ultrarefined taste in art was evident in her exquisite collection.
meanings.sent5: The ultrarefined perfume left a delicate trail of fragrance wherever she went.

meanings.definition: Processed to an extremely high degree of purity or quality.
meanings.sent1: The ultrarefined oil was used in the high-performance engine.
meanings.sent2: The ultrarefined gold jewelry gleamed under the lights.
meanings.sent3: The ultrarefined cheese was so pure that it practically sparkled.
meanings.sent4: His ultrarefined skills in woodworking produced flawless furniture.
meanings.sent5: The ultrarefined technology allowed for faster and more efficient processes.
